summary: The second season of *The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power* is set thousands of years before the events of J.R.R. Tolkien's novels. It explores the rise of Sauron and the creation of powerful rings. Produced by Amazon and New Line Cinema, the season was filmed in the UK and the Canary Islands, with much of the cast and composer from the first season returning. It premiered on Amazon Prime Video in August 2024, with a positive response from viewers and critics who praised its visuals and music.
title: The Lord of the Rings The Rings of Power season 2
